Module kivakit.resource
Package com.telenav.kivakit.resource

Class ResourceGlob<T extends Resource>

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.resource.ResourceGlob<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Matchable<T>, Matcher<T>, Predicate<T>
public class ResourceGlob<T extends Resource> extends Object implements Matcher<T>
A resource "glob" is similar to a file glob in UNIX. It matches resources by their paths, according to a pattern created by calling various logical methods.

Examples

 // Match all Java files
 match(Extension.JAVA)
 match(JAVA)
 match("**.java")

 // Match all but Java files
 match(JAVA).not()

 // Match all Java and markdown files
 match(JAVA).or(MARKDOWN)

 // Match all Java files except tests
 match(JAVA).not(resource -> resource.endsWith("Test"))

 // Match all class files in all target folders
 match("**/target/**").and(CLASS)
 match(CLASS).under(targetFolder)
 matchUnder(targetFolder).and(CLASS)
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Method Details

    • match

      public static <T extends Resource> ResourceGlob<T> match​(Matchable<T> matchable)
      Returns a glob that matches resources with Matcher for the given Matchable. For example, the Extension class is Matchable<Resource>, which allows it to be passed to this method to select resources: 
       match(Extension.JAVA)
 match(file.extension())
      Parameters:
      matchable - The source of a matcher
      Returns:
      The glob

    • match

      public static <T extends Resource> ResourceGlob<T> match​(Pattern pattern)
      Returns a glob that matches resources with the given regular expression pattern. For example: 
       match(Pattern.compile("[a-z]+[0-9]*"))
      Parameters:
      pattern - The pattern to match
      Returns:
      The glob

    • match

      public static <T extends Resource> ResourceGlob<T> match​(String globPattern)
      Returns a glob that matches resources with the given pattern. The pattern is a regular expression, with these differences applied:
      • ** - matches anything, including slashes
      • * - matches anything, except a slash
      • . - matches a dot

      Glob patterns are case-sensitive.

      Parameters:
      globPattern - The pattern to match
      Returns:
      The glob

    • match

      public static <T extends Resource> ResourceGlob<T> match​(Matcher<T> matcher)
      Returns a glob for the given resource matcher
      Parameters:
      matcher - The matcher
      Returns:
      The glob

    • matchAll

      public static <T extends Resource> ResourceGlob<T> matchAll()
      Returns a resource glob that will match anything

    • matchAllIn

      public static <T extends Resource> ResourceGlob<T> matchAllIn​(ResourceFolder<?> folder)
      Returns a glob that matches resources under the given folder
      Parameters:
      folder - The folder that resources must be under (recursively)
      Returns:
      The glob
